main event: Several unidentified flying objects were observed descending near Alexandria, Louisiana on 25 July 1960.
interesting points: The objects were observed on radar and described as having rotating lights or beacon lights,The sighting duration was approximately 15 minutes,The object changed its motion pattern and moved in a zig-zag manner,One witness, M/Sgt Robert F. Flyppsen, described the object as larger than a star and red in color,Despite reporting the sighting to the sheriff's office, there was a lack of interest in follow-up.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with rotating lights
witness description: M/Sgt Robert F. Flyppsen, on duty at England AFB
